source.cfg.ctrl_vector_im_2kW¶

This script configures sensorless vector control for a 2.2-kW induction motor drive.

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

BaseValues

This data class contains the base values computed from the rated values.

CtrlParameters

This data class contains parameters for the control system.
class source.cfg.ctrl_vector_im_2kW.BaseValues[source]¶

This data class contains the base values computed from the rated values. These are used for plotting the results.
